title: Web Developer
biography: On the net, they live under the name of JIYUUJIN. Birthday is November 04, 1988. Born in Toyonaka City, Osaka Prefecture. Gender is male. Currently, we are active mainly in the Kansai area (Kyoto and Osaka).
work_experience: I started my career as an iOS native app engineer. While acquiring basic coding through work as an application engineer, I also worked on improving the UX of the management screen (PHP) that runs behind it. I was fascinated by the part that went through the process of improving the Web, and gradually stepped into the area of ​​front-end engineers, such as Node.js and other front-ends, CSS design, and the use of frameworks.
profile: Production started in Feb 2020, published in Mar 2020. This profile site was opened in March 2020 to separate it from the technical blog and introduce itself. The position of the Web cat blog, which has been held by the stage / LT as an entrance to introduce oneself, will be changed for this profile site.
tech_hub: A website created to open a community (i-Company) that revolves around solving Web issues. I put together multiple media such as my blog and note in one feed.
blog:
A personal blog opened in October 2018 to disseminate knowledge. The name comes from the fact that he loves cats, which is his characteristic, and that he is good at the front end as an individual Web developer, and that he is also very interested in infrastructure.
At that time, Contentful, one of the Headless CMS, was running. There was an urgent need to have a product as an individual that is not affected by any external influences, such as the fact that we could not meet a permanent product even in the work scene and ended up in the middle of the process. Production has started based on Nuxt.js (v1.0.0-rc.11 at that time).
insight: A website established to calculate the performance of each website that it operates as a quantitative numerical value on a daily basis. The numbers here are based on PageSpeed Insights v5.
community_role: Participating in the following community as a staff member
